data.name: databaseList
findReferencedObjs
findReferencedTriggers
getObjectType
data.value: select ltrim(rtrim(o.type)) object_type from sys.objects o where o.object_id = object_id(@ObjectName)

data.name: objectList
data.value: select SCHEMA_NAME(o.schema_id) + '.'+ OBJECT_NAME(o.object_id) FullName , DB_NAME() DatabaseName , o.type , o.type_desc , o.modify_date from sys.objects o where o.name like '%' + isnull(@SearchName,'') + '%' AND o.type not in ('S', 'IT', 'SQ') AND o.type IN (<objTypes>) order by FullName;

data.name: prepareWeakObjects
showSource
showTableSource
